actions.text: Submitted in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment by Voice Vote.

official_title: A resolution making majority party appointments to Senate committees for the 99th Congress and electing chairmen of such committees.

summary.text: Makes majority party appointments, with chairpersons, to the following committees for the 99th Congress: (1) Agriculture, Nutrition, and Forestry; (2) Appropriations; (3) Armed Services; (4) Banking, Housing, and Urban Affairs; (5) Commerce, Science, and Transportation; (6) Energy and Natural Resources; (7) Environment and Public Works; (8) Finance; (9) Foreign Relations; (10) Governmental Affairs; (11) Judiciary; (12) Labor and Human Resources; (13) Budget; and (14) Rules and Administration.

titles.title: A resolution making majority party appointments to Senate committees for the 99th Congress and electing chairmen of such committees.
